text:
Security-sensitive Dangerous Substances Order 2009

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 84 of the Security-sensitive Dangerous Substances Act 2005 .

15 June 2009

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

LISA M. SINGH

Minister for Workplace Relations

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Security-sensitive Dangerous Substances Order 2009 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect immediately after the Dangerous Substances (Safe Handling) Regulations 2009 take effect.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Security-sensitive Dangerous Substances Act 2005 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Security-sensitive Dangerous Substances Act 2005 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 June 2009

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
